snippet: The hockey Hall of Famer Gordie Howe, at 84, occasionally has memory loss, according to members of his family.
abstract: Family of hockey Hall of Famer Gordie Howe denies reports that he has dementia, but acknowledges that he has occasional memory loss.

byline.contributor: Jeff Z. Klein contributed reporting from New York

lead_paragraph: The hockey Hall of Famer Gordie Howe, at 84, occasionally has memory loss, according to members of his family.

headline.seo: Gordie Howe’s Sons Deny Reports He Has Dementia
headline.main: Howe’s Sons Deny Reports That He Has Dementia
headline.print_headline: Howe’s Sons Deny Reports That He Has Dementia
